body.name: Calphalon Contemporary Hard-Anodized Aluminum Nonstick Cookware, Omelette Fry Pan, 8-Inch, Black
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 27 mins
features: Heavy gauge aluminum construction ensures even heating and is hard anodized for durability; It also makes it dishwasher safe
Interior includes 3 layers of nonstick coating 2 layers provide durability and the third layer offers easy release performance
The long, brushed stainless steel handles are designed to stay cool on the stovetop; Pans and covers are also oven safe, making it ideal for finishing a gourmet dish
Flat, wide bottoms heat evenly and provide plenty of room for cooking; The sloped sides are designed for easy tossing and rolling
The nonstick frying pan surface means you can cook healthier using less fat, with effortless cleanup; Comes with Calphalon's full lifetime warranty
body.description: Featuring a hard anodized exterior and nonstick interior. Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick combines durability and performance with fast clean up and easy low fat cooking.. Heavy gauge aluminum construction ensures even heating and is hard anodized for durability. It also makes it dishwasher safe. Interior includes three layers of nonstick coating – two layers provide durability and the third layer offers easy release performance. The long, brushed stainless steel handles are designed to stay cool on the stovetop. Pans and covers are also oven safe, making it ideal for finishing a gourmet dish. Flat, wide bottoms heat evenly and provide plenty of room for cooking. The sloped sides are designed for easy tossing and rolling. The nonstick surface means you can cook healthier using less fat, with effortless cleanup. Comes with Calphalon's full lifetime warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great omelette pan
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this every day for about two months since I got it to cook turkey bacon and one egg with cheese and it works great! Nothing sticks to it, even the melted cheese. I have also used it to fry other things with no problem. I like that it heats evenly and I never burn food with it. I only wash it by hand with a sponge and mild dish soap- I have never put it in the dishwasher, and it is very easy to clean. I bought the Calphalon nylon utensils to use with it and I have had no scratches or damage to the non stick surface. With proper care this seems to work very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had one of these pans for a long time and wanted a second one. Very happy with my purchase, these hard-anodized Calphalon skillets last absolutely forever + you can use them in the oven as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this exact omlett skillet from another vender on Amazon for almost the same price, it was chipped and scratched. Decided to try again from another vender and this one is perfect! Not one scratch and the rim was completely free of chips. So satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this pan. It is deeper than a regular fry pan. Cleans up easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I own multiple Caphalon pans and use them almost on a daily basis. This pan replaces a 8 in fry pan that lost it's non-stick capability over the years.The handle, as described on Amazon is: The long, brushed stainless steel handles are designed to stay cool on the stove top.I can tell you right now the handle is not long and as far as designed to stay cool, only time will tell. I rated this pan 3 stars for Lightweight and I don't want it to be. I expected it to have some heft and it does so no complaints there

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This skillet can cook at high temperatures, is truly nonstick, and is dishwasher safe. It cooks evenly--I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Knowing that what I order comes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorable first impression
reviews.reviewText: This pan does not disappoint. My early experiences are that the heating on my electric stove-top is uniform across the pan and that eggs, for one, do NOT stick to the surface. The handle is indeed short as mention by others but when I was done cooking it was still cool to the touch. If you were to cook helping after helping it probably would get uncomfortably warm but for single dishes cooked for just a few minutes - it is an egg pan after all - it should be no problem.Obviously I have no way yet to judge durability. We'll see ...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 25, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product and a satisfied customer. Good size and great to use
If you want to make a perfect French omelette this is your tool. Really high-quality very nice pan.

reviews.reviewTitle: No es el producto que ordene. No compren con este vendedor.
reviews.reviewText: Estoy muy molesto, no es el producto que ordene, el mango tiene un protector de plástico y por ello no puede usarse en el horno, el producto ofertado es más profundo y completamente redondo (sin dobleces para el vaciado del aceite). El sarten es mucho más ligero que un sarten de la misma marca y tamaño que tengo y que por su antigüedad ya lo quería cambiar, me quedaré con mi sarten antiguo en tanto compre otro en una tienda física para asegurarme que la calidad corresponda a la marca. No lo regresaré para no perder mi tiempo y seguramente lo desecharé pronto por su mala calidad. NO COMPREN ESTE PRODUCTO ES UN FRAUDE.

This is the best frying pan I have ever had. The handle doesn't get hot at all like some others; it is easy to clean; it cooks evenly, plus you can put it in the oven up to 450 degrees. I highly recommend it. I am going to purchase the 10" and 12" frying pans as well.

Great quality, handle is perfect. Too new to tell how durable, but perfect so far. Saw same brand, same size at another store $ 20. cheaper, but not even close in quality , design or appeal. You won't regret buying this pan
